H0.text: The 1992 film ‘Wayne’s World’ was a spin-off of a sketch from which US television show. In Living Color

H1.text: The 1992 film ‘Wayne’s World’ was a spin-off of a sketch from which US television show. Mad TV

H2.text: The 1992 film ‘Wayne’s World’ was a spin-off of a sketch from which US television show. The Ben Stiller Show

H3.text: The 1992 film ‘Wayne’s World’ was a spin-off of a sketch from which US television show. Snl

A4.text: The success of Wayne's World (1992) encouraged Michaels to produce more film spin-offs, based on several popular sketch characters.

A5.text: Successful sketches have seen life outside the show as feature films, including The Blues Brothers (1980), Wayne's World (1992) and A Night at the Roxbury (1998).
